title: First impression
body:
Hi, just downloaded it and these are my first impressions.

The first message I got was that I have lost too many games and I will need to win more to keep my rank, love this!
Love how smooth is, another plus is the new minimalisation of messages!

Something I find weird is how I lose the sound of queue, I'm currently in queue and constantly checking - paranoid that I may miss the popup!
Would love to be able to expand how big the client is. My monitor is set quite far from where I sit and with small writing it can sometimes be a pain to read.
Finally everything seems to be a bit unresponsive, maybe just an alpha issue but either way loving it! 

Excellent work Riot
